pullRequest.title: Add 128GB heap JVM decider
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #:
Description of changes:
This change adds a new JvmScaleUpPolicy and the associated RCAs.
What's in the PR:

Suggesting 128GB heap if there is old gen contention.

Known issues being addressed:

There is some code duplication around reading values like heap usage after gc, old gen utilization percentage between the HighHeapUsageOldGenRca and the two new RCAs introduced in this PR. I'm refactoring them to derive from a base OldGenRca(heapused, heapMax, gcEvents) so that the code calculate these are in one place instead of many.
Still using the old sliding window for now. Will use one of Leaky Bucket algo or Persistable sliding window.

Tests:
If new tests are added, how long do the new ones take to complete
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.
